00032 class Position //: public Vector3d
00033 {
00034  public:
00035   Position (void)
00036     {
00037       //cout << "DEBUG: " << "Position1" << "\n";
00038       //Vector3d::Vector3d(0, 0, 0);
00039       m_vect = Vector3d(0,0,0);
00040     }
00041 
00042   Position (double const x, double const y, double const z)
00043     {
00044       //cout << "DEBUG: " << "Position2" << "\n";
00045       //Vector3d::Vector3d(x, y, z);
00046       m_vect = Vector3d(x,y,z);
00047     }
00048 
00049   Position (double const x, double const y)
00050     {
00051       //cout << "DEBUG: " << "Position3" << "\n";
00052       //Vector3d::Vector3d(x, y, 0);
00053       m_vect = Vector3d(x,y,0);
00054     }
00055 
00056 
00057   void set_x(double const x)
00058     {
00059       m_vect.set_x(x);
00060     }
00061 
00062   void set_y(double const y)
00063     {
00064       m_vect.set_y(y);
00065     }
00066 
00067   void set_z(float const z)
00068     {
00069       m_vect.set_z(z);
00070     }
00071 
00072 
00073   double get_x(void) const
00074     {
00075       return m_vect.get_x();
00076     }
00077 
00078   double get_y(void) const
00079     {
00080       return m_vect.get_y();
00081     }
00082 
00083   double get_z(void) const

00086     }
